channel.title: Comments on: Why you should upgrade to Gnuplot 4.4.3

item.title: By: doget
item.dc:creator: doget
item.description: This is a wonderful passage, my plot looks much better after adapted those scripts. Thank you!
item.content:encoded: This is a wonderful passage, my plot looks much better after adapted those scripts. Thank you!

item.title: By: hagen
item.dc:creator: hagen
item.description: Yes, you could correct the plot yourself, but it is a little bit tricky to find the right values. You have not only to set the lmargin correct, but also the offset for the ylabel. To fix the plot in Fig. 1 you have to apply the following values: set ylabel 'y axis label' offset 14,0 set lmargin 8
item.content:encoded:
Yes, you could correct the plot yourself, but it is a little bit tricky to find the right values. You have not only to set the lmargin correct, but also the offset for the ylabel.
To fix the plot in Fig. 1 you have to apply the following values:
set ylabel ‘y axis label’ offset 14,0
set lmargin 8

item.title: By: anonymous
item.dc:creator: anonymous
item.description: Or you could just use "set lmargin" to assign the correct size yourself.
item.content:encoded: Or you could just use “set lmargin” to assign the correct size yourself.
